entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
